Uses of Class
org.opentdk.api.dispatcher.BaseDispatchComponent

Packages that use BaseDispatchComponent 
Package Description
org.opentdk.api.application  
org.opentdk.api.datastorage  

  • Uses of BaseDispatchComponent in org.opentdk.api.application

    Fields in org.opentdk.api.application declared as BaseDispatchComponent 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static BaseDispatchComponent EBaseSettings.APP_LOGFILE
    The variable APP_LOGFILE defines the full path and name of the file, where MLogger will log all messages and errors.
    static BaseDispatchComponent EBaseSettings.APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE
    The variable APP_LOGFILE_KEEP_AGE defines maximum age of logfile in days.
    static BaseDispatchComponent EBaseSettings.APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT
    The variable APP_LOGFILE_LIMIT defines the maximum size in kilobyte of the logfile.
    static BaseDispatchComponent EBaseSettings.APP_TRACE_LEVEL
    The variable APP_TRACE_LEVEL defines the level off logging messages by MLogger.

    Methods in org.opentdk.api.datastorage that return BaseDispatchComponent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    BaseDispatchComponent FilterRule.getFilterOperator()
    Get the filterOperator attribute which is used for validation of the filtered values.
    BaseDispatchComponent FilterRule.getRuleConcatenationOperator()
    Get the ruleConcatenationOperator attribute which is used to concatenate multiple filter rules.
    Methods in org.opentdk.api.datastorage with parameters of type BaseDispatchComponent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Filter.addFilterRule​(String headerName, String[] values, BaseDispatchComponent mode)
    Adds a rule definition into the rules property, that will check a condition against multiple values.
    void Filter.addFilterRule​(String headerName, String[] values, BaseDispatchComponent mode, boolean quoteRuleString)

    void Filter.addFilterRule​(String headerName, String value, BaseDispatchComponent mode)
    Adds a rule definition into the rules property, that will check a condition against a single value.
    The following sample filters all DataSets where the company name starts with 'LK Test Solutions':
    void Filter.addFilterRule​(String headerName, String value, BaseDispatchComponent mode, boolean quoteRuleString)
